title: First Send
description: Awarded for completing your first climb.

title: Beginner Climber
description: Congrats on completing 5 climbs! You're getting started.

title: Climbing Novice
description: Complete 10 climbs to show your commitment to the wall.

title: Ascent Apprentice
description: 25 climbs logged! You’re really getting the hang of it.

title: Boulder Enthusiast
description: 50 climbs completed! You love the challenge.

title: Send Master
description: 100 climbs logged! You’re a climbing master.

title: Peak Performer
description: 150 climbs completed! You’re climbing like a pro.

title: Vertical Veteran
description: 300 climbs completed! You’re a legendary climber.

title: Summit Sage
description: 500 climbs logged! You’ve reached elite status.

title: Crag Champion
description: 750 climbs completed! You’re at the top of your game.
